title: Unspecified eror with pacthing 6.24
body: Guys please help when i start update say unspecified eror check logs for more.If anyone now what to do pls help..

replies.body: I'd like to help!  At what percent in the patcher exactly are you getting the error?  Let me know!
Sometimes at 33%,but now on the 0% scan files and in one moment say unspecified eror i read something I need to delete some files but that is in diferent pacth write?

Thanks for the follow up!  If you are receiving an error at 0% then a pc or software setting is preventing the patcher from scanning game files, so it can't make updates.  As a first step, you'll want to go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  Let me know if you have any questions.
Everything is ok now when i reinstal with xextech program thanks man
I reinstall game and now he start normall download I think now is good I say you about 5 hours

And if you bealive me I instal again windovs and nothing
!!!
same thing happens to me thanks riot for not helping...posted myself and got nothing.
